Class SmtHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.SmtHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Handler

    public class SmtHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler, java.io.Serializable
    Class that handles all the SMT-syntax based work.
